roleset.name: violent exertion

example.name: Defecation causes the straining, 'he' would be the experiencer
example.text: He developed difficulties with constipation and it was described as a significant amount of straining with defecation.

roleset.note: Based on temprel data. Comparison to strain.01. Strain.01 is a member of VN class hurt-40.8-3-2. Framed by Katie.
